EmailTemplate.name: Cloud Platform Roadshow-Spring Q414.CPR-Washington DC
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud Platform Roadshow: Washington DC November 5
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/dc> Join Pivotal technologists and learn how to build and deploy great software on a modern cloud platform, with a focus on Spring and Java 8 developers.
At this workshop, you’ll get hands-on experience as you test drive Pivotal’s CF platform using the Spring Music sample application. In just a few hours, you’ll realize the speed and ease of pushing a Spring application on Pivotal CF. Who Should Attend
The workshops cover topics of interest to developers, architects, operations and technical managers. The keynotes set the stage for the workshops and will provide valuable insights for all. AGENDA
8:00 AM – 9:00 AM Registration & Breakfast
9:00 AM – 10:00 AM Keynote: Software Kept Eating the World
10:00 AM – 10:15 AM Coffee Break
10:15 AM – 11:30 AM Session #1: The Developer Experience
11:30 AM – 11:45 AM Coffee Break
11:45 AM – 1:00 PM Session #2 - Architecture & Operations
1:00 PM – 2:30 PM
Lunch & Afternoon Keynote: Continuous Delivery & Microservices
2:30 PM – 2:45 PM Coffee Break
2:45 PM – 4:00 PM Session #3 - Enabling Continuous Delivery
4:00 PM – 4:15 PM Coffee Break
4:15 PM – 5:30 PM Session #4 - Custom Buildpacks (Java) & Data Services
Register now <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/dc> for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. WEDNESDAY November 5, 2014 Sheraton Tysons Hotel 8861 Leesburg Pike Tysons, VA 22182 Register <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/dc> KEYNOTE PRESENTER James Watters Vice President of Product, Cloud Foundry KEYNOTE PRESENTER Matt Stine Platform Engineer, Cloud Foundry
